page.title: 13WORRIES IN THE SHERWOOD AREA
page.content: In July 1985 pupils from Roundwood Junior School investigated the worries and concerns of people in the Sherwood area of Nottingham.The investigation involved a survey of friends and rela -tives who were asked to choose their six greatest worries from a list of 18 The pupils' examination of the complet -ed questionnaires produced the follow -ing observations. The three most pressing causes of con -cern were the fear of nuclear war,the danger from child molesters and drug related problems.People were also very concerned about unemployment,hooligan -ism and violent crime.
